Up.Statement:
DECLARE
@dbname nvarchar(100), @domain nvarchar(100)
SELECT @dbname = DB_NAME()
SELECT @domain = CASE @dbname WHEN 'P0001_NatureLab' THEN 'http://www.selmedi.jp/' WHEN 'P0003_Selecture' THEN 'http://www.angers-web.com/' WHEN 'P0004_Endepa' THEN 'http://www.net-endepa.com/' WHEN 'P0006_Duras' THEN 'http://www.duras-store.jp/' WHEN 'P0008_Egoist' THEN 'http://egoist-store.jp/' WHEN 'P0011_Intercom' THEN 'http://direct.intercom.co.jp/' WHEN 'P0013_Terumo' THEN UPDATE w2_ShortUrl SET short_url = REPLACE(REPLACE(short_url, 'https://', 'http://'), @domain, '') ,long_url = REPLACE(REPLACE(long_url, 'https://', 'http://'), @domain, '')
